dict.acceptation: 不幸的，悲惨的；不快乐的；不恰当的；不凑巧的；

sent.orig: The affixes "un-"and"-less"are often used make negative words, such as unhappy or careless.
sent.trans: 词缀un-和-less常用来构成否定词，如unhappy和careless。

sent.orig: All happy families are like one another; each unhappy families is unhappy in its owe way.
sent.trans: 幸福的家庭都是相似的，而不幸的家庭各有个的不幸。

sent.orig: All happy families are alike, each unhappy family is unhappy in its own way.
sent.trans: 幸福的家庭都是一样的，不幸的家庭各有各的不幸。

sent.orig: All happy families are like another while each unhappy family is unhappy in its own way.
sent.trans: 幸福的家庭大多相似，不幸的家庭各有各的不幸。

sent.orig: When he asked her why she was so unhappy, she said she wasn't unhappy at all.
sent.trans: 他问她为什么不高兴，她说并未不高兴。
